relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, appeared chronically ill with bitemporal wasting.
relevant_findings.lymphadenopathy: Prominent submandibular lymphadenopathy and inguinal lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.jugular_venous_pressure: 15 cm of water with C-V waves observed.
relevant_findings.cardiac_findings: Slow regular rhythm, augmented second heart sound, multiple systolic murmurs at the left lower sternum and apical region, right ventricular heave, and pulsatile liver.
relevant_findings.edema: 3+ pitting edema in both legs, with multiple healing ulcerations on lower legs.
